title: Who are other amazing singers like Ed Sheeran? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hate to burst your bubble, bro, but IMHO Ed Sheeran is not very good. However, ignoring that fact, I would assume you want people with great vocal ability. Might try Rob Hlford (Judas Priest), Bruce Dickinson (Iron Maiden) if you're looking for metal. Axl Rose (Guns N Roses), Ian Gillian (Deep Purple) and the guy from Nitro, if you're looking for hard rock or classic rock. Benjamin Burnley (Breaking Benjamin), Myles Kennedy (Mayfield Four, Alter Bridge, Slash), Kurt Cobain (Nirvana) if you're looking for less heavy music.

Other singers who make songs like Ed Sheeran are- 1.Passenger He plays awesome guitar..    2. Kacey Musgraves Though Ed Sheeran & Kacey are from different genres,guitar is common between them.   3.Ellie Goulding 4.Taylor Swift 5.ColbieCalliat   6.John Mayer 7.Sam smith
